adjectives.description: ungentlemanly (comparative more ungentlemanly, superlative most ungentlemanly)

entries.meaning: Not gentlemanly; not adhering to the high moral standards expected of a gentleman; impolite, unchivalrous, or indecent.
examples: My grandmother thought it was ungentlemanly of my boyfriend to suggest that we split the bill for dinner.

adverbs.description: ungentlemanly (comparative more ungentlemanly, superlative most ungentlemanly)

entries.meaning: In a manner not befitting a gentleman.
